channel.title: Reactive Forms on juri.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Reactive Forms on juri.dev

item.title: Talk: Enterprise Grade Angular Reactive Forms
item.description: This year I again had the pleasure to come back to ng-be as a speaker. Since I see a lot of people struggle with creating proper forms, especially large forms, I gave a talk about how to optimize your Angular Reactive Forms with the help of ngx-formly.
